meanings.definition: Relating to the middle part of the kidney.
meanings.sent1: The mesonephric area of the kidney is important for filtering waste.
meanings.sent2: Doctors studied the mesonephric region to understand kidney function better.
meanings.sent3: The mesonephric section of the kidney decided to take a break from filtering.
meanings.sent4: Her kidneys felt like a bustling city, with the mesonephric district at its heart.
meanings.sent5: The mesonephric portion of the kidney was like a diligent worker, always cleaning up.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the mesonephros.
meanings.sent1: The mesonephric changes in the body were fascinating to the researchers.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the mesonephric functions of the body to the students.
meanings.sent3: The mesonephric system in the body decided to throw a party.
meanings.sent4: Her body felt like a well-oiled machine, with the mesonephric processes running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The mesonephric aspect of her body was like a hidden gem, vital yet often overlooked.
